title: GDG DevFest Sri Lanka 2015 Summary
brief: GDG DevFest Sri Lanka 2015 is now over. It was a great success. We are happy to share with you some facts, emotions and, of course, photos from the biggest Google Developers Conference in Sri Lanka!

title: GDG DevFest 2016 Announced
brief: DevFest 2016 was announced under 4 categories namely Fast, Efficient, Secure and Tidy. We would look at developing apps with these properties, in this year's event
